events.message: Customer reported a car collision that happened at an intersection, resulting in significant front-end damage to their vehicle.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident after identifying the keywords related to a vehicle collision scenario.
An insurance claim agent was assigned to handle the auto accident case and coordinate communication with the customer.
Acknowledgment of the received claim was sent to the customer promptly to confirm receipt and initial processing.
The agent requested vehicle repair estimates, police accident reports, and photos of the damaged vehicle to proceed with the investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including police report, repair quotes, and photos of the car damage as per the deadline.
The claims team started a detailed investigation of the accident circumstances and verified the submitted evidence and documents.
Investigation concluded, confirming fault and extent of damage to the vehicle consistent with the customerâ€™s account of the accident.
A settlement amount covering the repair costs and rental car reimbursement was proposed to the customer for acceptance.
The customer provided positive feedback, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and clear communication from the agent.
The claim was officially approved after customer agreement on the settlement, authorizing the payment process to begin.
The payment covering the vehicle repair and related expenses was issued promptly according to the agreed settlement terms.
The claim was officially closed as all necessary payments were completed and the customer confirmed repair work was finalized.
The claim documents and records were archived securely for future reference and compliance with company policies.
